I'm a Product Design Intern at Brewbot and a student of Interactive Design at the University of Ulster. If you fancy a chat, you can email me at aaron@aarongilmore.com or tweet me @aarondgilmore.

Articles


  • How I Brew Coffee · 15 May 2014

    • I started drinking coffee at a very young age. Of course at the time, my mug would have been filled with sugar and milk to try and cut the then harsh taste.

Projects


Brewbot

Brewbot uses sensor technology to track and automate the brewing process. Simply follow the instructions in the app, add the ingredients when prompted and, hey presto, you can call yourself a brewer.

View Project

Glasshouse

Glasshouse is my current side project. It's a collection of sensors in a glasshouse that push temperature, soil moisture, and humidity data to your mobile device.

View Project
